title: Tributes flow for Kobe Bryant and daughter Gianna
text:
Celebrities, politicians and sports stars have been paying tribute to NBA legend Kobe Bryant and his 13-year-old daughter Gianna, who were among nine people that died in a helicopter crash in Calabasas, California, this morning.

Los Angeles-based reporter Carol Ramos talks us through what happened, and the significance of Bryant's legacy.
meta_description: NBA legend Kobe Bryant and his 13-year-old daughter Gianna were among nine people that died in a helicopter crash in Calabasas, California, this morning.
